short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests AI answers to forum questions, have real time Latex preview. Currently works on *.edstem.org & *.epfl.ch, more to come.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:

This Chrome extension is designed to seamlessly integrate with EdStem and Moodle, two of the most widely used educational platforms. Injecting a user-friendly button into the interface empowers educators with AI-driven suggestions to answer forum questions and real time Latex preview.

Features:

Easy Integration: Once installed, our extension automatically recognizes EdStem and Moodle platforms, integrating a clickable button onto the forums' user interface.

AI-Powered Answers: It provides AI-powered answers using GPT4 and other state-of-the-art models

Enhanced Productivity: With our extension, educators can efficiently address common student queries faster and with less input from the teaching staff

Latex Preview: Next to the AI answer suggestion a real time Latex preview is also provided to improve the experience of Teaching staff


The main benefit of our tool is to speed up response times to student queries, offer consistent quality in replies, and enhance the overall teaching experience.
